summary: App with student login functionality using mobile number and password

existing_features.title: Add React Query hooks (useStudentLogin, useStudentRegister) in useQueries.ts that call the new backend studentLogin and registerStudent functions.

Replace the existing OTP-based StudentLogin page (frontend/src/pages/StudentLogin.tsx) with a mobile number + password login form. The page should have two tabs or toggle options: 'Login' (mobile number + password fields) and 'Register' (mobile number + password + confirm password fields). On successful login, navigate to the student dashboard.

new_feature_requests.summary: Student login with mobile number and password

Update the backend student authentication to support password-based login: add a password field to the Student data type, provide a registerStudent function that accepts mobile number and password, and provide a studentLogin function that verifies mobile number + password and returns a session token.
